title: Plan 9 from Outer Space in Color

sources.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1959) – “worst movie ever made”, starring Bela Lugosi
sources.channelName: Public Domain Movies - Classic Old Movies

sources.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space (1959) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: Plan 9 From Outer Space is a 1959 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com   Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io   A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org   GPU: Google Colab. This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

metadata.Plot: Aliens from outer space reanimate the Earth's dead in an attempt to save the human race. Restored and In Color.
